westwalker_camp.name: Westwalker Campfire
westwalker_camp.description: A small, well-kept campfire crackles, a lonely point of light against the vast, darkening plains of the Frontier. The edge of the Griefwood looms like a wall of shadow in the distance. The air carries an unusual chill.

actions.info: Your ranger's pack is light but well-stocked. You have what you need to survive.
The area seems quiet... too quiet.

actions.text: Follow the trail toward the Griefwood

griefwood_edge.name: Edge of the Griefwood
griefwood_edge.description: Dark trees crowd together, their twisted branches forming a barrier of shadow. Whispers ride the wind from within the forest.

actions.info: The shadows seem to shift of their own accord.

griefwood_clearing.name: Griefwood Clearing
griefwood_clearing.description: A small clearing bathed in dim light where ancient stones rise from the earth. The air here hums with old power.

actions.info: Strange runes glow faintly, hinting at forgotten rituals.

jorn.name: Town of Jorn
jorn.description: A hardy frontier settlement that serves as a trading post for trappers and travelers. Smoke rises from sturdy stone chimneys.

actions.info: Merchants offer pelts, iron tools and tales of the forest.
The innkeeper welcomes you with a weary smile.

leonin_encampment.name: M'ra Kaal Encampment
leonin_encampment.description: The scent of woodsmoke and roasting meat hangs in the air. Around you, the proud Leonin of your clan share stories and sharpen their blades. The sounds of the Ancestral Roar still echo in your spirit.

actions.info: Two warriors are locked in a duel of skill, their movements a blur of muscle and steel. It is a dance of honor.
Zema Mataal is deep in communion and cannot be disturbed.

gaian_library.name: The Great Library of Gaia
gaian_library.description: Sunlight, filtered through high, arched windows, illuminates swirling dust motes. The air smells of old parchment and endless knowledge. Scholars move like ghosts between towering shelves.

actions.info: The sage nods slowly. 'The Convergence, yes... a time of great peril and great opportunity. The stars do not lie.'
You find a dusty tome that mentions 'celestial schisms' and 'realm-thinning' during past Convergences.
